test.welcome:
Welcome to your new farm! I have put a couple of seeds into your Inventory, so you can start to grow some crops right away. You can access the inventory by pressing [{keyMapping.inventory}]. 
Oh, you may want to know how the other controls work first... Press [{keyMapping.up}], [{keyMapping.down}], [{keyMapping.left}] or [{keyMapping.right}] to walk around. [{keyMapping.item1}], [{keyMapping.item2}] and [{keyMapping.interact}] are the three action buttons. 
You can see what they are currently doing on the top right corner of the sceen. [{keyMapping.interact}] is used to interact with your environment. The buttons [{keyMapping.item1}] and [{keyMapping.item2}] are where you can use your equipped items. While in the inventory, press one of those buttons to equip the currently selected item. 
A few meters in front of you there are patches of fertile soil. As a first task, you should equip one of your seed bags and start planting your crops!
